title: The best ever Great British Bake Off recipes - our definitive guide
text:
It's up there with Game of Thrones, Fleabag and Strictly as one of those shows that unites the nation. And now The Great British Bake Off has returned to our screens. Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith take over the tent to judge the contestants' best efforts, with Noel Fielding and Sandi Toksvig presenting.

This year's contestants are younger than previous years – with an average age of 31 (perhaps to appeal to the show's growing millennial fanbase) – but we can still expect examples of culinary masterpieces as in previous years.

Who can forget the baked Alaska and Charlotte russe? We share recipes for these, along with many of our favourite bakes from the past nine series, to celebrate the return...
description: It's up there with Game of Thrones, Fleabag and Strictly as one of those shows that unites the nation.
